info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 4:14AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WESTERN BEAUREGARD... NORTHWESTERN CALCASIEU AND WESTERN VERNON PARISHES...NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON...SOUTHEASTERN TYLER...NEWTON...EASTERN HARDIN... NORTHWESTERN ORANGE AND JASPER COUNTIES THROUGH 445 AM CST... At 411 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fred, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Beaumont, Lumberton, Jasper, Silsbee, Newton, Kirbyville, Kountze, Sour Lake, Merryville, Anacoco, Evadale, Toledo Bend Dam, Fred, Fields, Bon Weir, Burkeville, Deweyville, Call, Starks, and Mauriceville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
